322796.「うむ。よく来てくれた。\n そなたたちが グランゼニス神の復活に向けて\n 動:
Good, you're here. I heard that you're making
headway in the revival of Gran Zenith.

322797.「話というのは 他でもない。\n エテーネ王国の式典から 帰ってきて以来\n 眠:
And this is about none other than Anlucia,
I surmise. She's been asleep ever since the
ceremony in the Ethene Kingdom.

322798.「アンルシアは グランゼニス神の器。\n この異常な眠りは かの神と\n 大きく:
She is the vessel of Gran Zenith.
Her abnormal slumber must be related
to him somehow.

322799.「ゆえに アンルシアの目覚めこそが\n グランゼニス神復活のカギとなるのではない:
That is why...I believe that awakening Anlucia
will be the key to Gran Zenith's revival.

322800.「あるいは 神の復活が果たされなければ\n 器も目覚めない という可能性もある。:
Or is it that the vessel will remain asleep
until the god is revived? Whatever
the case may be, it's all just speculation...

322801.「……叡智の冠の賢者よ。迷うことはない。\n 何か 手がかりがあるなら この者に:
Sage of the Crown of Wisdom... You mustn't
show any hesitation. If you have any ideas at
all, please share them with <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>.

322803.「我のことは どうでもよい。\n 勇者の目覚めと 神の復活は 表裏一体。:
Don't worry about who I am. The Hero's
awakening and Gran Zenith's revival
are two sides of the same coin.

322804.「ならば その両者と関わりのある この者こそ\n もっとも 答えに近い場所に い:
Then it's only logical that <if_woman>she<else>he<endif> is closest to
finding the answer, having a connection with
them both and all. Don't you agree?

322805.「あれ……<pc>隊長？\n ここ どこ？ このおねーさん 誰？:
Huh...? <pc>...? Where am I?
Who's this woman?

322806.「私は このグランゼドーラ王国に仕える\n 賢者 ルシェンダだ。\n そなたは…:
I am Lushenda, a sage in the service of this
kingdom of Gran Zedora. And you are...?

322807.「あたしは ポルテ！\n 賢者の ええっと……ルシェンダさま！\n はじめまして:
I'm Porte! Sage, uh...Lushenda!
Pleasure to meet you!

322808.「ふむ……。そなたが\n 報告にあった ポルテという少女か。\n そなたの助言に:
Hmm... So you're that Porte girl from the
report. I will heed your advice.

322809.「アンルシアの目覚めについて\n 何か知っている者がいるとすれば\n それは シ:
If there's anyone who knows anything about
Anlucia's awakening, Shion would.

322810.「シオン殿は現在 行方知れずとなっているが\n 先日 彼の部屋で 手に入れたもの:
He is currently absent, but I found something
in his room just the other day. It was this
feather.

322811.「わあっ。キレイな羽根だね。\n シオンって人の持ち物なの？:
Wow, what a pretty feather!
And they're from this Shion?

322812.「これが手がかりとなるか わからんが\n シオン殿を捜しだし アンルシアを\n:
I'm not sure how it will help exactly, but
I hope that you can find Shion and
awaken Anlucia.

322814.「どうにかして あたしたちは\n その人を捜さないと いけないんだよね？\n う:
We gotta find him somehow, right?
Hmm... But how...

322815.「ねえねえ <pc>隊長。\n もしかして ラキなら この羽根のニオイを\n た:
Hey, <pc>! Maybe Lycae can track
the smell from this feather!

322816.「狼になれるんだし 鼻が利きそうでしょ？\n エテーネの村へ戻って ラキに頼んで:
He can turn into a wolf, so he's probably got
a strong nose, right? C'mon, let's head to
Ethene Village and ask him to help!

322817.「方法は まかせる。\n シオン殿が姿を消したことにも 理由があろう。\n 頼ん:
I'll leave it to you, then. There must be
some reason for Shion's disappearance.
Don't let us down, <pc>.

322818.<pc>は やぐらの中に入り\n地下に降りて 奥の部屋へと 向かっていった。:
<pc> makes their way inside the
fort, heading down into the chamber
below.

322819.「うわぁ～！ 白いお馬のぬいぐるみ？\n ゆる～い感じが なんか かわいいね！:
Wow! A white horse plushie?
I love how dopey it looksーit's so cute!

322820.「よく 見つけてくれましたね <pc>。\n おひさしぶりです シオンです。:
I'm surprised you found me, <pc>.
It's been quite some time. It's me, Shion.

322822.「行きちがいになった時の 連絡手段として\n 白き導き手を そこに 残しておきま:
As a way to stay in contact in case we missed
one another, I left the Handy Horse there.
It appears to have come in handy.

322823.「お手数ですが 今から\n 光の神殿へ 来ていただけませんか？\n 私も すぐに:
Could you please head to the Temple of Light
right away? I am on my way there as we
speak.

322824.「グランゼニス神の復活。アンルシアの目覚め。\n それらに関わる 重要な話をした:
I would like to discuss important matters
concerning Gran Zenith's revival and Anlucia's
awakening. I will see you there!

322826.「念のため 聞くけど そのぬいぐるみが\n シオンって人じゃないよね？:
Just to be clear... That plushie isn't Shion,
is it?

322827.「羽根のニオイは\n その白いのから してたみたい。:
The feather's smell is coming from that
white thing.

322828.「シオンさん？……の 言ってたとおり\n 光の神殿ってとこへ行けば\n 本人に:
Shion, right...? Is what he said true?
Will we be able to meet him in person if
we go to the Temple of Light?

322829.「ラキも行く！\n グランゼニス神の復活……\n その話 ラキも聞きたい！:
Lycae is coming too!
If it's about Gran Zenith's revival, he
wants to know all about it!

322830.「よ～し。それじゃ\n シオンさんに会いに みんなで\n 光の神殿へ ゴーゴー！:
Alrighty, then! Let's go to the Temple of
Light to meet with Shion!

322831.「ここが 光の神殿……？\n なんだか 静かすぎて 落ち着かないとこだね。:
So this is the Temple of Light...?
It's so quiet, it's making me feel anxious...

322832.「シオンは どこ？\n 誰の気配も 感じない……。:
Where is Shion? Lycae can't sense anyone's
presence here...

322834.「よく来てくれました <pc>。\n こうして会うのは 本当に ひさしぶりです。:
I'm glad you've come, <pc>.
It really has been ages since we last met like
this. Are these two new companions of yours?

322835.「わぁ あなたが シオくんだねっ。\n お馬さんになれるなんて すっご～い！:
Wow! You must be Shion!
It's so amazing that you can turn into
a horse!

322836.「なるほど……。\n おおいに 興味はそそられますが\n 時間が惜しいので 今は:
I see... I am quite intrigued, but time is of
the essence here. Let's proceed with the
discussion.

322837.「私は これまで 復活の時にそなえて\n 地上のどこかから わずかに感じられる\:
I have been following Gran Zenith's faint
presence from somewhere on the surface,
all in preparation for His revival.

322838.「そして 創失と呼ばれる現象が起こった時\n それに呼応するかのように 光の神殿:
And when this phenomenon called "unmaking" occurred, His presence began emanating from this temple quite stronglyーalmost as if He
was reacting to it.

322839.「ですが それはすぐに 途切れてしまいました。\n 復活を果たすのに グランゼニ:
However, that presence soon faded. It seems
that Gran Zenith's current power is
insufficient for His revival.

322840.「<pc>。あなたは\n 神の緋石のことを 覚えていますか？: You remember the Divine Crimsonite, yes?

322841.「グランゼニス神の血より生まれた 守りの石。\n 全部で ４つの緋石が アストル:
A protective stone, born from Gran Zenith's
own blood. In all, there were four of them
that were worshipped throughout Astoltia.

322842.「大魔王マデサゴーラの腹心\n 魔元帥ゼルドラドの 策略によって\n ひとつが:
One remains shattered by the machinations of
Madesagora's chief marshal, Zeldrad.

322843.「おそらくは それが チカラが足りない原因。\n 主が復活を果たすには 砕かれた:
Perhaps that is the reason for His lack of
power. For His revival to happen, that Divine
Crimsonite must be repaired.

322844.「そのためには 無事に残った３つの緋石の\n チカラを集める必要があり それをあ:
To do so, I'll need you to gather the power of
the three Crimsonites that remain intact.
That is why I had called you here.

322846.<pc>は シオンから\n緋色の宝石（だいじなもの）を 受け取った。<me 60:
<pc> received the Crimson Jewel
(Key Item) from Shion.<me 60>

322847.「その宝石を持って モンセロ温泉峡の奥に向かい\n ご神体の間に まつられた 神:
With that jewel in hand, head to the Hall of
Worship deep within the Moncello Spring
Gorge to gather the Crimsonite's energy.

322848.「勇者の盟友たる あなたであれば\n それを手にし 強く願うだけで\n 事が 成:
As the Hero's ally, you should be able to do
so if you desire it strongly enough.

322849.「モンセロ温泉峡以外の場所は\n この私が 向かいますので ご心配なく。:
I will head to the other locations myself, so
you needn't worry about them.

322850.「グランゼニス神の復活が果たされれば\n その加護を受けた勇者も 目覚める……。:
When Gran Zenith is revived, the Hero who
has received His blessing shall also awaken...
I am sure of it.

322851.「では 私は これにて。: With that, I shall take my leave.

322852.「シオくん 行っちゃった……。\n 聞きたいこと いろいろ あったのになあ。\n:
And Shio's gone...and I had so many questions
I wanted to ask him, too... Like, "Are carrots
your favorite food?"...

322853.「……それより やるべきことを やらないと。\n すぐに モンセロ温泉峡に 行こ:
But we've more important matters.
Let's go to Moncello Spring Gorge right
away!

322854.「あっ。あそこにあるのが 神の緋石かな？: Oh! Is that the Divine Crimsonite?

322855.「こいつ 邪魔する気か……。\n <cs_pchero> 戦おう！:
That monster is trying to stop us...
<cs_pchero>! Come on!

322856.「なんなの あの魔物！！\n ラキが 助けてくれなかったら\n ペシャンコになっ:
What was with that monster?!
If Lycae hadn't saved me, I'd be as flat
as a pancake right now!

322857.「あの魔物のニオイ……\n 前に どこかで 嗅いだような……。:
That monster's smell...
It smells familiar...but from where?

322858.「でも この辺りは 腐った卵みたいな\n ニオイが きつくて はっきりしない……:
But there's a strong rotten egg smell in this
place, so it's difficult to tell...

322859.「う～ん。気にはなるけど 今は\n 緋石のチカラをもらうのが 先かな。\n <c:
Hmmm... I am curious, but I think we should
focus on the Crimsonite first. I'll leave that
to you!

322860.<cs_pchero>の意思が伝わり\n緋色の宝石が 神の緋石のチカラで\n満た:
<cs_pchero>'s resolve is conveyed,
filling the Crimson Jewel with the power
of the Divine Crimsonite!

322861.「<cs_pchero> ご苦労様です。\n 神の緋石が 宝石に反応したのを感じ:
Thank you for your help. I sensed that the
Crimsonite reacted to the jewel without
incident.

322862.「無事じゃないよ シオくん！\n よく わかんない魔物に 襲われたんだよっ。:
But there WAS an incident, Shio! Some monster
tried attacking me!

322863.「なんと……。それは 予想していませんでした。\n 危険な目にあわせてしまい 申:
What...? I was not expecting that. My apologies for putting you in harm's way. If there are those who wish to disrupt us,
then we must be even quicker...

322865.「さて。こちらのほうも ピラミッドと\n ダーマ神殿の緋石のチカラを 得られまし:
In any case...I've gathered the power of the Crimsonites in the Pyramid and Alltrades Abbey. All that remains it to repair the
Crimsonite that's broken.

322866.「そうすれば グランゼニス神のチカラも高まり\n 復活が なされるはずです。:
Then Gran Zenith will regain His power, and
can finally revive.

322867.「緋石のある古き神の遺跡は ソーラリア峡谷ごと\n 大魔王の生みだした ねじれた:
The last Crimsonite was in the Historic Ruins. It was supposed to disappear when the whole of Solaria Canyon was overwritten by
Madesagora's Twisted Deformed Earth...

322868.「女神ルティアナの加護ゆえか 今も\n 偽りの世界に 存在を残しているのです。\:
Perhaps, because of Lutiana's blessing, it
still may have a presence in the false world.
Madesagora likely did not expect that.

322869.「おかげで 神の緋石を再生できるというもの。\n 偽りのレンダーシア ソーラリア:
You can find it by going deep within the
Historic Ruins of the Solaria Canyon within
the false Lendersia.

322872.「この紳士の お仲間の方ですか。\n 今まさに 処刑を執行しようというところに\:
Are you companions of this gentleman?
You've interrupted me just as I was about
to carry out my punishment.

322873.「無論 あなた方も 同罪です。\n 神の緋石を 再生させようなどという愚行は\n:
Of course, you are just as guilty as he.
Your folly in trying to restore the Divine
Crimsonite will not be allowed.

322874.「わたくしめは 執行者ガンガブラと申す者。\n 我が主の命により あなた方を処刑:
I am Gangabra, an enforcer.
I've come here to kill you by orders of my
master.

322875.「こいつ……\n 温泉で戦った魔物と 同じニオイ！:
He... He has the same smell as the monster
from the hot springs!

322876.「このニオイ……さっきは わからなかったけど\n とうさまに まとわりついていた:
This smell... Lycae didn't realize it before,
but it's the same smell as the curse of
unmaking that clung to Father!

322877.「えっ。どういうこと？\n 創失の呪いは 消え去ったんじゃないの？:
Huh? What do you mean?
Isn't the curse of unmaking supposed to be
gone?

322878.「わからない……。\n けれど こいつは すごく危険。:
Lycae doesn't know...
But he is really dangerous!

322879.「ラキと <cs_pchero>が 相手をする。\n ポルテは 下がってて！:
Lycae and <cs_pchero> will take care of this.
Stay back, Porte!

322880.「抵抗するのですね。\n ただ 苦しみが増えるだけなのに\n 愚かとしか 言いよ:
So you mean to resist me? How foolish.
You only worsen your suffering.

322881.「しかし それを望むのならば\n こちらも お応えいたしましょう。\n いざ！！:
But if that is what you desire, then I will
be happy to oblige!
Come at me!!

322882.「これは 申し訳ありません。\n わたくしめは あなた方のことを\n すこしばか:
My apologies. It seems that I've
underestimated your abilities.

322883.「今回は いったん 退きましょう。\n 神の緋石が 再生されてしまうのは\n 業:
I'll withdraw for now. It's frustrating that
you'll be able to restore your Divine
Crimsonite, but there's just no other option.

322884.「おまえは なんだ？\n どうして 創失の呪いと 同じニオイがする！？:
Just what are you?
Why do you have the same scent as the
curse of unmaking?!

322885.「その問いに 答える必要を 認めません。: I see no need to answer that question.

322886.「罪人は ただ いずれ執行される\n 刑の恐怖に 震えていればいいのです。\n:
Criminals need only tremble in fear of the
punishment they inevitably face!
Ahahaha!

322888.「<cs_pchero> すみません。\n 緋石再生の準備に 集中していたせいで:
I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. I was so focused
on preparing to restore the Crimsonite
that I let my guard down.

322889.「キズのほうは 大したことは ありません。\n どうか ご心配なく。: Don't worry. My wounds are nothing serious.

322890.「ラキは…… だいじょうぶかな？: Lycae... Is he going to be okay?

322891.「彼の安否は 気になりますが\n 後を追う手段が なくては どうにも……。\n:
His safety is concerning, but unfortunately without a means to go after him, there's nothing we can do... For now, let's try
restoring the Crimsonite.

322892.「緋色の宝石に宿したチカラを使い\n 砕かれた緋石の再生を 試みます。\n あな:
I will attempt to restore the shattered
Crimsonite with the power contained in
the Crimson Jewel. Please assist me.

322893.「大いなる神の遺せし 加護の緋石よ。\n そのチカラを 今ここに 呼び起こさん。:
O blessed Divine Crimsonite, bequeathed by
our great god... I call your power here.
Respond to our resolve!

322894.「ふう……。再生は 成功しました。\n これで グランゼニス神のチカラが高まり\:
Phew... The restoration was successful. With
this, I believe that Gran Zenith's power will
return, and encourage His revival.

322895.「ラキも それを望んでたもんね。\n まごゼニスさまが 復活すれば\n あの 執:
That's what Lycae hoped for, too.
If Other-Zenith comes back to life, even
that enforcer guy can't threaten us!

322896.「これは……！\n グランゼニス神の強い気配を 感じます。:
Is this...? I feel Gran Zenith's presence
quite strongly!

322897.「ですが 光の神殿からではない。\n グランゼドーラ城の……\n アンルシアの部:
But not from the Temple of Light.
From Gran Zedora Castle...near Anlucia's
room...?

322898.「アンルシアの部屋へ 向かいます。\n あなたも すぐに 来てください。\n 状:
I'm headed to Anlucia's room now.
Please meet me there immediately. We
have to see what's happened!

322899.「アンルシアは まだ 眠っているようです。: Anlucia is still asleep, it seems.

322901.「……じつに 久方ぶりだな。\n 我が眷属 天馬ファルシオンよ。\n 息災なよう:
...It's been quite awhile. Pegasus
Falchion, my servant... Glad to see
that you're well.

322902.「なんだか ずいぶんと かたくるしい\n しゃべり方の お姫さまなんだね。\n:
You speak pretty pompously, even for a
princess... You're way different than the
image I had of you in my head...

322903.「その懐かしき気配は……。\n まさか そんなことが……！？:
This nostalgic feeling...
C-can it be...?!

322904.「いかにも。我が名は グランゼニス。: Indeed. My name is Gran Zenith.

322905.「これは いったん\n 状況を整理する必要が ありそうですね……。:
I think we need to take a moment to sort out
this situation...

322906.「……神の緋石によって 高まったチカラが\n あなたの復活を うながしたものの\:
The power gathered by the Divine Crimsonites
did prompt your revival, but for some reason,
only your spirit was resurrected.

322907.「創失の呪いに侵されるのを 防ぐため\n あなたの加護によって 眠りつづけていた:
And you entered Anlucia's body, who slept with
your blessing to prevent the curse of unmaking
from reaching her...is that right?

322908.「うむ。本来 身体と精神の復活は\n 同時に 果たされるはずであったのだ。:
Yes. Both the revival of my body and spirit
were to happen at the same time.

322909.「この まごゼニスさまを\n ゼニアスに 連れていっても きっと\n ネーしゃま:
Even if we take Other-Zenith to Zeniath, I'm
sure Zenny would say it's a no-go.

322910.「完全なる神の復活とは 言えないでしょう。\n アンルシアのためにも 早急に\n:
It may not be a complete revival, but for
Anlucia's sake, He must be revived
fully, and soon.

322911.「私が 女神ルティアナより 賜った神器……。\n 断罪の剣は 今 どうなっている:
That divine artifact that Lutiana gave me,
the Sword of Atonement...what of it now?

322912.「グランゼニス様が ご兄姉のチカラを借りて\n ナドラガ神との戦いで 振るった剣:
That is the sword that you brandished in
battle against Nadraga, with the help of your
siblings.

322913.「この目で 見たい。\n 我が身体の復活には あの剣が必要だ。:
I want to see for myself.
I need that sword to restore my body.

322914.「なるほど……。断罪の剣のチカラまで\n 必要になるとは 思いも寄りませんでした:
I see... I had no idea that you would require
the sword's power after all. I am truly sorry.

322915.「おまえは 勇者の片割れのようだな。\n この状態では 私の神としてのチカラにも:
You look to be the Hero's other half.
Looks like my divine power is pretty limited
right now. You'll come with me, right?

322916.「<pc>。私からも お願いします。\n 断罪の剣は 竜族の世界 ナドラガンドの:
I ask this of you as well. The Sword of
Atonement is pierced within the land of
the Nadragram Shrine.

322917.「もちろん あたしも ついていくよ。\n まごゼニスさまを 完全復活させれば\n:
Of course we'll go with you! If we can revive
you all the way, then the Princess can go
back to normal, right?

322920.「グランゼニス様の御身は 光の神殿にあります。\n 私は そちらで 準備を進めま:
Gran Zenith's body lies in the Temple of
Light, so I will make preparations there.
Please excuse me.

322921.「それじゃ <pc>隊長\n 竜族の世界ナドラガンドにあるっていう\n 神墟ナド:
Come on, <pc>! Let's head to
Nadragand and go to that Nadragram Shrine!

322922.「これは…… ひどい状態だな。\n あの激しい戦いに さらされたのだ。\n 無理:
So this is it... It's pretty beat up.
But that battle was pretty fierce, so it's
understandable...

322923.「しかし このままでは 私の身体の復活に\n 役立てることは 難しいだろう……。:
But it'll be hard to use it to revive my body
in such bad condition...

322924.「そんなあ……。それじゃ\n どうすれば いいんですか まごゼニスさま？: Oh, no... What should we do then?

322925.「私は かつて このナドラグラムの地で\n 断罪の剣を振るって 兄であるナドラガ:
Here in Nadragram, I once used this sword
and waged an epic battle against my brother,
Nadraga.

322926.「そして 最後の一撃を与えた際に\n 剣の刃が 大きく 欠けてしまったのだ。\n:
When I dealt the final blow, the sword's
blade chipped pretty badly. If I could
find the missing piece, then...

322927.「だが 破片は ナドラガの身体の中だ。\n 取りもどすのは 至難の業だろうな。:
But that piece is inside Nadraga's body.
It won't be so easy getting it back.

322928.「やっと 追いつきました。\n みなさん こちらに おられたんですね。:
I finally caught up. I didn't realize you were
all here!

322929.「あれっ エッちゃん？\n どうして ここに？: Huh? Estie?! What are you doing here?

322930.「アンルシアさんの容体が 心配だったので\n グランゼドーラ城を 訪ねたのですが:
I wanted to see how Anlucia was doing, so I
went to visit Gran Zedora Castle. But I saw
that she had already awakened.

322931.「賢者ルシェンダさんに 話を聞いたら\n さらに 大変なことになって ナドラガン:
I spoke with Lushenda who told me that things
had gotten even more serious, and that you
were headed for Nadragand.

322932.「私も 何か お役に立てないかと思い\n 急いで みなさんを 追いかけてきたので:
So I hurried to catch up with you to see if I
could be of any help.

322933.「おまえは 竜族の神官か。\n 見たところ ナドラガの器であるようだな。:
A Nadravian priestess? From what I can tell,
you look to be a vessel of Nadraga.

322934.「その話し方……。\n 本当に グランゼニス神が\n アンルシアさんの身体に……:
That manner of speech...
So Gran Zenith really IS inside of
Anlucia's body...

322935.「この剣の破片が ナドラガの体内にある。\n 私は それを取りもどさねばならない:
The missing piece of this sword is inside
Nadraga's body and I must retrieve it.
Will you help?

322936.「しかし ナドラガ神は すでに 滅びました。\n 取りもどすと 言われても……。:
Though you say you must retrieve it,
Nadraga has already perished...

322937.「身体は滅びても 意思は残る。\n 神とは そういうものだ。:
Even if the body perishes, its will remains.
That's how gods are.

322938.「それでは 今でも ナドラガ神の意思に\n 触れることが かなうと……。:
So, you're saying it is still possible to come
into contact with Nadraga's will...?

322939.「そのはずだ。そして 私が\n ナドラガを説得し 彼の内に残された\n 断罪の剣:
It should be. I'll then convince Nadraga to
return the piece of the sword left inside
of him.

322940.「……今は わかりません。\n ですが もしかしたら かつての総主教ならば\n:
I'm not sure if that's possible now. It's
possible that the former Patriarch knew more
about it.

322941.「その方法を探してみようと 思います。\n 大神殿の 総主教の部屋まで\n 来て:
Would you be willing to join me in the
Patriarch's room inside the Grand Temple?

322943.「わかりました。大神殿は\n 炎の領界の 聖都エジャルナにあります。\n 総主教:
Right. The Grand Temple is located within
Ejarna in the Fire Realm. The Patriarch's room
is in the temple's second floor.

322944.「あなたも 来ていただけますか。\n 私は ひと足先に エジャルナに向かい\n:
Could you two come as well? I will make my
way to Ejarna first to let Tobias know what's
going on.

322945.「炎の領界の大神殿に 行くんだね。\n 竜族の住んでる世界って 見たことないもの:
We're going to the Grand Temple in the Fire
Realm! The Nadravian world is full of things
I've never seen before...it's all so exciting!

322946.「お待ちしていました みなさん。\n こちらは ナドラガンド協団の指導者\n ト:
We've been waiting for you. This is Tobias,
head of the Nadraga Alliance.

322947.「ようこそ ナドラガンド協団へ。\n アンルシア姫…… いや\n 人間の種族神:
Welcome to the Nadraga Alliance, Princess
Anlucia...or should I say Gran Zenith, god
of the humans.

322948.「エステラより 話は聞きました。\n ナドラガ神の意思を 神の器に降ろす手段を\:
Estella tells me that you are seeking a means
to infuse Nadraga's will into the divine
vessel.

322949.「しかし アストルティアを 滅ぼさんとした\n 邪神として 討たれた存在なのです:
But as a wicked god who wanted to destroy
Astoltia, he was struck down. Are you sure
it's wise to invoke his will?

322950.「今の私もそうだが 神といえど\n 器に 意思だけが宿った状態では\n できるこ:
Even as I am now, I can confirm that gods
can only do so so much with only their
will inside a vessel.

322951.「ナドラガとは 私が 話を付ける。\n 何か 手立てが 見つかったのであれば\n:
I'll deal with Nadraga myself. If you know of
a way to proceed, please tell me immediately.

322952.「私は このナドラガンドに残る魔瘴を浄化すべく\n かつての総主教 オルストフの:
I've researched the various texts and documents left behind by our former Patriarch, OrstovーI needed to find a way
to purify the miasma that remains in Nadragand.

322953.「その書物の中に 神の器へ\n ナドラガ神の意思を 降臨させる儀式について\n:
Those texts described the ritual of Nadraga's
will descending into a divine vessel.

322954.「それって エッちゃんが\n 今の まごゼニスさまみたいな感じに\n なっちゃう:
So, does that mean that Estie will be just
like Other-Zenith is now?

322955.「……そのとおりだが 一時的なものだ。\n 儀式の効果は そう長くは続かないらし:
That's right, albeit only temporary. The
ritual's effects don't appear to last very
long. I haven't tested it, though...

322956.「たとえ この身に 危険があるとしても\n 私も 燈火の調査隊の一員です。\n:
Even if it puts me at risk, I am a member of
the Ember Explorers. I'll do everything and
anything I can to help!

322957.「して その儀式というのは\n すぐに できるものなのだろうか？:
So then. Is this ritual something that can
be done quickly?

322958.「各領界の ナドラガ神のほこらに\n 神官を派遣して 一斉に 祈りを捧げるのです:
I will send priests to the Nadraga Shrines in
each realm and have them pray in unison.
It'll be quite the undertaking for sure.

322959.「そのうえ 領界を守護する神獣たちにも\n 許可を取り 協力を求めなければなりま:
What's more, we must receive permission from the divine beasts in each realm and gain their cooperation. I'll begin the arrangements, but
this isn't something that can be done quickly.

322960.「そうか。ならば 待つしかあるまい。\n だが 急いでくれ。この身体では\n 神:
I see. I suppose I'll have to wait, then.
But please hurry. I can barely use my divine
power in this body.

322961.「はい。できるだけ すみやかに\n 事を進めましょう。:
Of course. Let's proceed as quickly as we
can.

322962.「では みなさん。\n 儀式の準備が ととのうまで\n しばらくは この大神殿に:
Then, if I may ask you three...please stay
here in the Grant Temple until the ritual's
preparations are complete.

322963.「すみませんが この大神殿の\n 私が使っていた部屋まで 来ていただけますか？\:
Sorry to ask, but could you please come to
my old room? I'd like to discuss what I have
planned.

322964.「じゃ あたしは その間\n 大神殿の中を 探検してこようかな。\n まごゼニス:
Well...I think I'll go ahead and explore the
temple in the meantime. Come on,
Other-Zenith! Let's go together!

322965.「ちょっと 待て。\n 勝手に 部屋に入られては\n 神官室清掃担当の私が 困る:
Hold it right there. I'm the cleaner of the
priests' rooms. If you come in here
without permission, then I'll get in trouble.

322967.「……何か 言いたげなカオだな。\n 聞きたいことがあるなら\n 素直に この私:
...You look like there's something you want
to say. Well, if you do, I think you should
go ahead and do it.

322968.「……エステラ？ それは 誰のことだ。\n そんな名の神官は 大神殿に いないの:
...Estella? There's no priest by that name
in this temple.

322969.「ここは ずっと 空き部屋になっていて\n 今まで 誰も使ったことのない部屋だ。:
This room has always been vacant and no one
has ever used it. I should know, I clean it!

322970.「ふたたび 創失が 起こったということだ。\n よもや ナドラガの器が 消えてし:
So unmaking has happened yet again.
Never did I think that Nadraga's vessel
would disappeared.

322971.「創失の呪いは 消え去ってはいなかった。\n これは 由々しき事態だ。\n 策を:
The curse of unmaking yet remains. This is a
very serious situation. We have to act...

322972.「先ほど 創生のチカラのうねりを感じた。\n この辺りから 強く発せられたようだ:
I felt the power of creation swell just a few
moments ago. It seemed strong in this area.
What is going on here?

322973.「……あれれっ？ みんな どうしたの？\n ここで 何か あったの？:
...Huh? What's everyone doing here?
Did something happen?

322974.<pc>は ポルテたちに\nエステラの存在が 創失してしまったらしいことを\n伝:
<pc> informs Porte and Gran Zenith
that Estella's existence was unmade.

322976.「今 この状況で 神の器が……。\n これは 本当に偶然なのか……？:
And now of all times, a divine vessel...
Is this really a coincidence...?

322977.「<pc>よ。\n 協団の指導者…… トビアスと言ったか？\n その者の所へ 向:
The leader of the alliance...Tobias, was it?
We need to go see him.

322978.「本当に ナドラガの器が 失われたとしたら\n 我々の目的が 危うくなる。\n:
If Nadraga's vessel really is gone, then our
mission is in trouble. We need to find out
what's going on right now.

322979.「何を ごちゃごちゃ言っているのだ？\n この部屋に 用事がないなら\n さっさ:
What are you all doing here?! If you've things
to talk about, then do it outside! Please
leave!

322980.「これは グランゼニス神。\n いかがされましたか？:
If it isn't Gran Zenith.
What brings you here?

322981.「ナドラガ神降臨の儀式の件が\n どうなっているか 確認しておきたい。:
I'd like to know the status of that ritual
of Nadraga's will.

322982.「その件でしたら 無理と お伝えしたはずです。\n 儀式に必要となる ナドラガ神:
Well, I've already told you that it's not
possible. We haven't been able to find a
qualified vessel for the ritual.

322983.「あのっ。エッちゃ……じゃなくて\n エステラさんのこと 覚えてませんか？:
Umm... Don't you remember Estie...
Ah, no... Estella?

322984.「エステラ……？\n そのような名に 心当たりはないが\n 神の器と 関係のある:
Estella...? The name isn't familiar.
Is she related to the divine vessels
somehow?

322986.「やはり ナドラガの器は\n 創失の呪いを受けて その存在を\n 消されてしまっ:
It looks like Nadraga's vessel has been
unmade by the curse after all...

322987.「トビアスさま 大変です！！\n 謎の魔物の襲撃を 受けたとの報告が\n あちこ:
Tobias! We have urgent news! Reports are
coming from each realm about attacks
from mysterious monsters!

322989.「この炎の領界にもですっ。\n 魔物は 神出鬼没で 対処に難儀していると！:
The Fire Realm, too! Monsters are wandering
the area and are difficult to subjugate!

322990.「すぐに 討伐隊を編成し 対応しろ。\n 他の領界のほうは どうなっている？:
Organize a strike force and respond
immediately! What of the other realms?

322991.「水の領界は 青の騎士団。\n 嵐の領界では 疾風の騎士団が\n 対応に当たって:
The Blue Brigade is handling the Water Realm,
and the Storm Realm by the Gale Knights!

322992.「氷の領界は 出現した魔物の数が\n さほど 多くないとのことですが\n 闇の領:
The number of monsters appearing in the Ice
Realm is not a concern, but the Dark Realm...
it's difficult to search there...

322993.「むう……。しかし 魔物の勢力が\n いかほどのものなのか わからぬことには\n:
Ngh... But without knowing how strong these
monsters are, we can't send our forces in...

322994.「トビアスよ。\n 我々が 闇の領界に 向かおう。: Tobias. We'll go to the Dark Realm.

322995.「よいのですか？\n 願ってもない 申し出ですが……。:
Are you sure?
It's an extremely welcome offer, but...

322996.「人々の危機とあらば 放ってはおけぬ。\n 我々に まかせてくれ。:
When people are in danger, I can't just sit
idly by. Leave it to us.

322997.「謎の魔物の出現は 神の器の創失と\n 無関係とは 思えん。\n 行って 確かめ:
I don't think the monsters are related to the
vessel's unmaking. We'll just have to go
and see for ourselves, right?

322998.「そうだね。もし 関係なくても\n 困ってる人がいるなら 助けてあげなきゃ！:
I agree! If there's someone in needーeven if
you don't know themーyou gotta help!

322999.「……恩に着ます。\n 闇の領界では まず カーラモーラ村に行き\n 村長に 状:
...I very much appreciate the help. In the Dark Realm, I suggest going to Carlamora Village first and speaking to the
village chief there.

323001.<pc>たちは サジェの姿を捜して\n影の谷上層の中央辺りまで やって来た。:
<pc> and co. make their way to
the center of the upper reaches of the
Vale of Shadow in search of Sajay.

323002.ふと 空を見上げると\n竜の姿をした魔物が たくさん\n飛びまわっていることに:
Looking up into the sky, they notice many
dragon-like monsters flying about!

323003.「もしや あの少年が サジェか？\n 魔物たちに 狙われているぞ！:
Is that boy Sajay? Those monsters are after
him!

323006.「……いや。\n アイツは 壊れてしまったんだ。\n じゃあ その後継機の Ｑ４:
No...he broke.
Then this must be the next one,
Q485!

323007.「複数ノ 敵性体ヲ感知。\n 危険度極大ノタメ 緊急排除シマス。:
MULTIPLE HOSTILE ENTITIES DETECTED.
DUE TO EXTREME DANGER, THEY WILL
BE ELIMINATED IMMEDIATELY.

323008.「排除ノ完了ヲ 確認。\n 現地点ノ安全ヲ 確保。\n すきゃん開始。残存スル敵:
COMPLETION OF ELIMINATION CONFIRMED.
CURRENT LOCATION SECURED. COMMENCE
SCANNING. SEARCHING FOR REMAINING HOSTILES...

323009.「ありがとう Ｑ４８５！\n ボクを 助けてくれたんだな。:
Thank you, Q485!
You really saved me!

323010.「キミは <pc>？\n どうして ここに？:
Is that...<pc>?
Why are you here?

323011.「あたしたち この領界が 謎の魔物に\n 襲われてるって聞いて 助けにきたの！:
We heard that this realm was under attack by
some weird monsters, so we came to help!

323012.「こやつに 先を越されたがな。\n 面白いカラクリだ。ワギの造ったものか。:
That thing beat me to it, though.
What an interesting machine. Did Wagi
create that, I wonder?

323013.「サジェっちは さっきの魔物を\n 調査するために ここに 来たんだよね。\n:
So you came here to investigate those monsters
we just saw, right? Did you find out anything?

323014.「え……。ああ。\n アイツらが 何者かは まだ調査中だけど\n 推測できること:
Huh? ...Oh, yeah. I'm still trying to figure
out what they really are, but I can certainly
speculate!

323015.「アイツらは 影の谷の奥にある\n ナドラガ神のほこらから 飛んでくるみたいだ。:
I saw them flying from the Nadraga Shrine deep
within the Vale. I think that's where they're
all coming from.

323016.「……ふむ。\n ならば 確かめる必要があるな。: Hmm... Then we need to go see.

323017.「ありがとう。あとは あたしたちに任せて\n サジェっちは 村に戻って！\n キ:
Thanks! You can leave the rest to us.
Sajie, you head back to the village!
You'll be fine with Q, right?

323018.「すきゃんガ 完了シマシタ。\n 新タナ敵性体ヲ感知。排除ニ 向カイマス。:
SCAN COMPLETE.
NEW HOSTILE ENTITY DETECTED.
BEGINNING ELIMINATION.

323019.「アイツらが 別の場所に 現れたのか！\n そこに 行くんだな？:
They showed up somewhere else!
Are you going after them?!

323020.「ボクは Ｑ４８５と 一緒にいくから\n キミたちは ナドラガ神のほこらへ向かっ:
I'll go with Q485, and you guys head to the
Nadraga Shrine!

323022.「だいじょうぶかな あれ……。: I wonder if he'll be okay...

323023.「先ほどの戦いを見る限り\n あのカラクリなら 問題なさそうだ。:
That contraption seems to be fully capable of
battle.

323024.「ここから 謎の魔物が 現れるの？\n だ～れも いないし\n な～んにも ない:
Is this where those monsters are coming from?
There's nobody here...and nothing there...

323025.「いや いるな……。ポルテよ。\n おまえは 少し 離れておくんだ。:
No, something is here...
Porte. Step back for a moment.

323028.「この 怨みがましい思念……。\n この地に染みついた 竜族の怨念のようだな。:
These resentful thoughts...they're likely the
grudges of the Nadravians that are ingrained
in this place.

323029.「ナドラガに扇動され 他種族に害をなした竜族は\n 罰として 領界での過酷な生活:
Those who were incited by Nadraga to harm other races were punished to remain here in this realm. It's no wonder they have such
strong resentment.

323030.「ナドラガの神の器が 創失の呪いを受けたことで\n 抑えられていた怨念が 一気に:
When Nadraga's vessel was unmade by the curse,
this bottled up resentment came bursting out
all at once. That's probably what happened.

323031.「こやつは 少々 やっかいな相手だ。\n 慣れぬ身体ではあるが 私も ともに戦お:
This one will be pretty tough.
Although I'm not used to fighting inside
this body, I will fight with you.

323033.「くっ……。この地には\n どれだけの怨念が 眠っているというのだ！: Ggh... Just how many grudges are there?!

323035.「敵戦力 ゾウダイ。\n 現在ノ装備デハ 完全排除不可能ト 判断。\n 最終攻撃:
ENEMY FORCES GROW LARGER. WITH CURRENT EQUIPMENT, COMPLETE ELIMINATION IS DETERMINED AS NOT POSSIBLE. SHIFTING TO FINAL ATTACK
MODE: SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE.

323036.「バカなこと 言うなよ！\n こんなとこで 自爆なんかしたら\n みんな 死んじ:
Don't be dumb! If you blow yourself up here,
then we'll ALL die!

323037.「要望：ばかナコト 言ウナヨ\n ＝ 自爆停止要請ト 理解。\n 自爆しーけんす:
QUERY: "DON'T BE DUMB." = REQUEST TO STOP
SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE.
SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE CANCELLED.

323038.「敵性体 排除ノ 方法ナシ。\n 一時 撤退ヲ開始シマス。:
ELIMINATION OF HOSTILE ENTITIES IS NOT
POSSIBLE.
BEGINNING TEMPORARY RETREAT.

323040.「さしもの ワギのカラクリも 打つ手なしか。\n 私が 完全であれば どうとでも:
Even Wagi's machine is no match...
If I were complete, this would be no problem.
But as I am now...

323041.「下がれ ポルテ。\n おまえが ただの人間でないことは\n わかっている。だが:
Stay back, Porte!
I understand you're no ordinary human,
but you still can't!

323042.「いいや。ここは 我に まかせてもらう。\n 放置すれば この怨念は 闇の領界の:
No. Leave this to me. If left alone, these
grudges will engulf the whole of the Dark
Realm, completely destroying it.

323043.「ひいては ナドラガンドそのものが失われる。\n ナドラガンドも アストルティア:
Eventually, all of Nadragand will be lost.
And Nadragand is a part of Astoltia...so we
absolutely cannot lose it!

323044.「我がチカラをもって 封じ込めてくれようぞ！: I'll use my power to seal them away!

323046.「ほう たいしたものだ。\n あの怨念を すべて 封じ込めるとは。:
Huh... Quite impressive.
You really were able to seal away all that
hatred...

323047.「おまえは いったい 何者なのだ？\n 我が神の目をもってしても 判然としない。:
Just who are you, really?
Even my divine eyes can't tell.

323048.「一度 聖都エジャルナの大神殿に戻るとしよう。\n ポルテを早く 休ませてやりた:
Let's head back to the Grand Temple.
Porte needs time to recover.

323049.気を失ったポルテを抱えて\n休ませてあげられそうな場所を 探していると\n竜族の:
While looking for a place to let the
unconcious Porte rest, the voice of a
Nadravian priestess calls out...

323051.「どうか ご心配なく。\n 見たところ ケガなどはありませんし\n 過労のような:
You can rest easy about her. From what I can
see, she's suffered no injures and has just
passed out from exhaustion.

323052.「助かった。ポルテのことを頼めるか？\n 我々は 協団の指導者に 闇の領界のこと:
Thank you. Can you look after her? We have to
go tell the Alliance leader about what's
happened in the Dark Realm.

323053.「待て <pc>……。\n ふたりきりで 話したいことがある。\n ここに 残っ:
Wait, <pc>... I'd like to talk to
you alone. Could you stay for a moment?

323055.「我が 何者なのか……。\n そなたも おおいに 気になっていよう。:
You must be very curious about whoーor
whatーI truly am.

323056.「我に残された時間は 少ない。\n 今のうちに 伝えておくべきかと思うてな。:
I haven't much time left, so I thought I'd
tell you while I still can.

323057.「女神ルティアナの創りし世界 アストルティア。\n 創生のチカラをもって生まれし:
Astoltia, the world created by the Goddess Lutiana... All things born with the power of creation are given life, and, at times, even
wills of their own...

323058.「我は アストルティアの大地そのもの……\n その意思が具現化した存在と 理解す:
I am the land of Astoltia itself...
The embodiment of its very will.

323059.「この世界に 降りかかった 創失の呪いを\n 自ら 振り払うため アストルティア:
To rid of the curse of unmaking that befell
this world, Astoltia's will decided to take
the form of a human that could move freely.

323060.「しかし この姿となった我は\n 長く 活動することが かなわなかった。\n す:
However, in this form...I am not able to
remain active for long. For you see, the curse
has already taken hold of this body.

323061.「そこで 我は 創失の影響を受けていない部分を\n 切り離して 新たな人格と成さ:
So I separated the part of me that was unaffected by the curse, and formed it into a new personality. That is Porte. The girl
you know well.

323062.「あの娘と我は 同時に顕現することはできぬが\n 心の内の世界でなら 話すことは:
She and I cannot manifest at the same time,
but we are able to communicate with one
another inside our hearts.

323063.「人としての 知識や常識を教えているうちに\n 我のことを 師匠と\n 認識して:
She has come to recognize me as her master,
as I continued to teach her mortal knowledge
and common sense.

323064.「……我が そなたと出会ったのは\n エテーネ王国の お披露目式のときであったか:
The first time we met was at the unveiling of
the Ethene Kingdomーthe place where the
curse showed itself.

323065.「幾人かが 存在そのものを消されたが\n 周りの者は 誰も それを認識できずにい:
Some were erased from existence, but no one
even realized that they were gone.
Only you were able to...

323066.「そなたは 幾度も 神のチカラに触れたことで\n 自覚の無いまま 創生のチカラの:
You have touched the power of the gods many times. Without realizing it, you've become capable of sensing changes in the power of
creation.

323067.「ゆえに そなたに 磁光石を託した。\n あの娘とともに 創失の呪いを\n 根本:
That is why I entrusted the Magnetolite to
you. I had hoped that together with her,
you might destroy the curse of unmaking.

323068.「しかし 先ほどの怨念を 封印するため\n 想定外に 大きなチカラを使ってしまっ:
However...I had to use an unexpectedly large
amount of power to seal those grudges away.
I'll need to rest for awhile...

323070.「お話が 終わった頃かと思いまして。\n あらあら？ 眠ってしまわれたんですね。:
I thought you might be finished talking by
now. Oh? Seems like she's fallen asleep.

323071.「ポルテさんのことは ご安心ください。\n 私が 看ていますので。:
You've no need to worry about her.
I'll take good care of her.

323072.「トビアス様に ご用があるのでしょう？\n ２階の総主教の部屋に いると思います:
I assume you have business with Mr. Tobias?
You should be able to find him upstairs in
the Patriarch's room.

323073.「<pc>殿 お疲れ様でした。\n グランゼニス神より 話は聞いています。:
Excellent work, <pc>.
I heard everything from Gran Zenith.

323074.「謎の魔物たちの正体は 竜族の怨念……。\n そして 闇の領界に あふれでていた:
So those mysterious monsters were Nadravian
grudges made real...and thanks to your help,
they've been successfully sealed away.

323075.「ナドラガンドの民を代表して\n ご協力に 感謝いたします。:
On behalf of the people of Nadragand, you have
my humble thanks for your cooperation.

323076.「闇の領界での封印が 影響したのか\n その他の領界でも 敵の勢力が\n 弱まり:
I've received reports that the sealing done in the Dark Realm has impacted the other realms as well. The monsters seem to be decreasing in
number.

323077.「それは 朗報と言えるが……\n ナドラガの器の件を どうにかせねばならん。:
I'd say that's good news, but...
We still need to do something about Nadraga's
vessel.

323078.「トビアスさまに ご報告です！！\n 各領界から 謎の魔物たちが 一斉に\n 撤:
We have something to report! We've received
reports that the mysterious monsters have
begun retreating from the other realms!

323079.「おおっ。我々の勝利か？: Oh! So we were victorious, then?

323080.「それが その……。\n 報告を総合すると 謎の魔物は すべて\n ある場所へ向:
Well, that's the thing... Based on all the
reports we've gotten, it seems those monsters
are all headed to a certain place.

323081.「神墟ナドラグラムです！\n これは 撤退というより 何か 目的があって\n 向:
They're headed for the Nadragram Shrine!
This is no retreat, but rather, a gathering
for a specific purpose...

323082.「ナドラグラムだと！？\n かの地にある 竜神の柩には ルビーが……。:
Nadragram?! Ruby still lies within the coffin
there!

323083.「……いや。狙いは 断罪の剣のようだ。\n すでに 怨念の竜が とりついて\n:
No... The Sword of Atonement is likely their
target. I can already see those dragons
trying to possess it and use it for evil.

323084.「断罪の剣のところへ 向かうぞ <pc>。: We need to get over to the sword.

323085.「我々は 引きつづき 警戒を続けましょう。\n 神墟ナドラグラムのこと どうか\:
We'll continue to stay vigilant. Please, take
care of whatever is happening in the
Nadragram Shrine.

323086.「あなたがたのご武運を 祈っております。: I wish you all the best.

323088.「どこに行こうと 追いかけてくる……。\n まったく うっとうしい 坊やですね。:
Whenever I go, you're always right behind
me... What an annoying little brat you are!

323089.「ラキは 速い。\n おまえじゃ 逃げられない！: Lycae is fast. You can't escape from him!

323090.「わたくしめには 果たすべき任があるのです。\n これ以上 邪魔をしないでいただ:
I have a duty I must fulfill.
I ask that you interfere no longer!

323091.「おお…… 我が主よ…………。\n お手をわずらわせて 申し訳ありません。:
Ohhh, master...
My apologies for forcing your hand.

323092.「なんだ あれは……。\n まったく 本性が見通せぬ。:
What IS that...?
I can't see its true nature whatsoever...

323096.「ナドラガ神の器を消した わたくしめの\n 創失の呪いを はじきますか。\n 腐:
So...it repels the same curse that destroyed
the vessel of Nadraga. Impressive...even
corrupted, it is indeed a divine artifact.

323098.「おおっ 竜族の怨念を利用して\n 断罪の剣の内なる世界へと 道を開くとは。\n:
Ohh!! To use the Nadravian resentment to
open the way within the sword...
Just brilliant, master!

323099.「さしもの 神器といえども\n 内なる世界から その急所を攻めれば\n 容易に:
Even a divine artifact cannot withstand an
attack to its weak point from within.

323100.「邪魔をしたいのならば ご自由に どうぞ。\n もちろん 命の保証は いたしませ:
If you wish to interfere...then be my guest.
Of course...I can't guarantee that you'll
live.

323102.「おのれ……。\n 断罪の剣を失うわけには いかん。\n 後を追うぞ <pc>よ:
Blasted...! We can't afford to lose the Sword.
I'll follow you inside, <pc>!

323103.「今のラキは 足手まとい……置いていって。\n 大丈夫。自分の身は 自分で守れる:
Lycae will just slow you down...he will stay
here. Don't worry. He can take care of
himself...

323104.「やはり 追ってきましたね。\n となれば おもてなしをしなくては。:
So you've decided to come after all?
I suppose I'll have to show some hospitality.

323105.「彼らと 遊んであげてください。\n それでは ごきげんよう。:
Have fun playing with them.
All the best!

323106.「時間稼ぎとは こざかしい。: Stalling for time...how crafty of you.

323107.「あやつらは 奥へ 向かったようだ。\n 急ぎ 後を追うぞ！:
They're headed that way.
We have to hurry and follow them!

323109.「我が息子 グランゼニスよ。\n 母から そなたに 授けたいものがあります。:
Gran Zenith, my son... Your mother has
something she wants to give to you.

323111.「神器のひとつである この剣を\n そなたに 授けましょう。:
I bestow upon you this sword, one of the
divine artifacts.

323113.「皆の神器と 同じではありません。\n この剣は 神器の中でも 罪を断つという\:
It is unlike the artifacts your siblings have.
This sword is a sacred weapon that cut
through sin itself.

323114.「グランゼニスよ。\n そなたは いずれ とこしえのゆりかごの\n 未来を 継ぐ:
Gran Zenith. You will one day become the heir
to the Eternal Cradle's future.

323115.「そのとき そなたは 多くの罪に向き合い\n 断ち切っていくことに なるでしょう:
When that time comes...you will face many a
sin that you will need to cut down.

323116.「勇気をもって 罪に向き合いなさい。\n そなたならば この剣のチカラを借りて\:
Face these sins with courage in your heart.
With the power of this sword, it will be
possible.

323120.<center>そんなに 落ち込まないでよ。\nグランゼニスには がんばってもら:
Don't lose heart! We need to make sure you
do your best, Gran Zenith!

323121.<center>私たちは 身体を失っちゃったけど\nその意思は まだ ここに あ:
We may have lost our bodies, but our wills
yet remain. Isn't it too soon to give up hope?

323122.<center>……同意する。\n我らのチカラ おまえに託そう。\n一度 敗れた:
...Agreed. We entrust our power to you.
Even if we have been defeated once, there
is no need to be afraid.

323123.<center>たとえ 我らの意思が\nそれで消えようとも 悔いは ありません。:
Even if our will is extinguished, we shall
have no regrets. Please, you must protect
the future of our children...

323124.<center>我らが末弟 グランゼニスよ！\nさあ 立ち上がるのだ。\nそして:
Gran Zenith, our youngest of brothers!
Rise up! Put an end to the folly of our
foolish older brother!

323130.<center>アァァアァァアァ……おのれ……。\n我は この世のすべてを 支配:
Aaaaargggh...! Curse you...!
This world belongs to ME!!

323131.<center>ゆるさぬ…… ゆるさぬぞォ。\nグランゼニィィィィスッ！！:
I won't... I WON'T LET YOU!!
GRAN ZENIIIIIITH!!!

323133.「あれは 断罪の剣の チカラの核とも\n 言うべきものだ。もし 破壊されたならば:
That's the core of the Sword of Atonement.
If destroyed, the sword itself will be lost
forever.

323134.「邪魔をするか。\n ならば 斬り伏せるのみ。:
You mean to get in our way?
Then I'll just have to cut you down!

323135.「ふむ。神の化身を相手にしては\n こちらの分が 悪いと言えましょう。:
Hmm... I suppose it's true that I don't have
the greatest chance of winning against a
divine avatar.

323136.「しかしながら 我が主の前で\n ふたたび 醜態をさらすわけには\n いかないの:
However... I will not show disgrace in front
of my master ever again!

323137.「これが執行獣と呼ばれる わたくしの本来の姿。\n もちろん 見た目だけでないこ:
This beastly body is my true form. But of
course, you understand that not only my
appearance has changed, yes?

323139.「神の器をも消し去った 創失の呪い……。\n たとえ 種族神でも 人の身に宿った:
The curse of unmaking that has erased even a
divine vessel... You may be a race god, but do
not think you are safe!

323140.「おまえが あの呪いの根源か。\n 必ずや 討ち倒し\n ナドラガの器を 取りも:
So you are the source of the curse, then?
I'll just have to cut you down, and bring back
Nadraga's vessel!

323141.「さあ……。ここから 消え去りなさい！:
Very well...
Begone from this place!!

323143.「……ぐうう。そんなバカな。\n わたくしめが このような敗北を……。:
Gggh... How absurd...
to suffer such a defeat...

323144.「我が主…… 申し訳ありません。\n どうか わたくしめを あなたの御許に……。:
Master... I am sorry...
Please allow me to be one with you...

323147.「剣の核を壊すのを あきらめたのか？\n あやつに 何が 起こったのだ……。:
He gave up on destroying the core?
What's happened...?

323148.「見た限り 異常は ないようだ。\n 断罪の剣は 守られた。:
Everything looks normal to me.
The Sword of Atonement is safe.

323149.「私ひとりでは 防ぎきれなかっただろう。\n おまえのはたらきに 感謝するぞ。:
I couldn't have done this on my own.
I appreciate your help.

323150.「ここは あやつらが\n 無理やり こじ開けた場所だ。\n 時間の流れが 不安定:
They forcibly broke into this place.
I can feel the flow of time becoming
unstable.

323151.「長く とどまることは 得策ではない。\n すみやかに 外に出るべきだろう。\n:
We shouldn't stay here for much longer.
Let's go check on Nadraga's vessel.

323153.「エッちゃんが 帰ってきたのに\n いつまで待っても ふたりが 出てこないから\:
Estie came back...but I was waiting for you
two for so long! I was so worried!!

323154.「私が消えた後 どうなっていたのか\n ポルテさんたちから くわしく 聞きました:
I heard everything from Porte and the others
about what happened after I disappeared.
I'm grateful for your rescuing me.

323155.「どうやら 時間の流れに ゆがみが生じ\n 何日か 経過してしまったようだな。:
It looks like there was a distortion in the
flow of time, causing a few days to pass...

323157.「うん まごゼニスさまっ。\n 目が覚めてから だいぶ 経ったし\n もう すっ:
Yeah! I've been awake for a while now, and
I feel super great!

323158.「ラキも 平気！\n あの程度のキズ なめとけば 治る！:
Lycae is fine, too!
He licked his wounds clean!

323159.「よし。まずは 皆が無事で 安心したぞ。\n 神の器も 戻ってきたとなれば\n:
Good. I'm glad that you all are safe. Now
that we have the divine vessel, we can
focus on the revival of my body.

323160.「その件ですが ナドラガ神の意思を私に宿す\n 降臨の儀式の準備は トビアスの尽:
Speaking of that, the preparations for the
ritual have already been carried out, thanks
to Tobias' efforts.

323161.「私が 創失の呪いを受けたせいで\n 無駄な時間を 使わせてしまいました。\n:
I've only wasted your time due to the curse...
It would be best if we made haste.

323162.「わかった。すぐに 始めてくれ。\n 断罪の剣の破片を返してくれるよう\n 私が:
Right. Let's begin right away.
I'll then convince Nadraga to return the
Sword's piece to me.

323163.「それでは 降臨の儀式を始めましょう。\n すべての領界に向けて 合図を送ります:
Very well. Let us begin the descension ritual.
I will signal the other realms now!

323164.エステラに ナドラガ神の意思を降ろすべく\n降臨の儀式が 開始された。:
The descension ritual had begun, to infuse the
will of Nadraga within Estella.

323165.各領界の ナドラガ神のほこらに派遣された\nナドラガンド協団の神官たちが\n駆け:
The priests of the Nadraga Alliance, gathered
at each of the Nadraga Shrines, offer their
prayers together with the divine beasts...

323166.各領界で 捧げられた祈りが\nナドラガ神の意思を 呼び覚ましていく……。:
The prayers offered from each realm awaken
Nadraga's will...

323169.「やはり 兄上なのだな。\n 久方ぶり……と言って いいものか。:
It really is you. It may not be right for me
to say this, but...it's been so long.

323173.「そうだ。母上より授かった 断罪の剣に\n 神器としてのチカラを 取りもどしたい:
Yes. I want to restore the power of the divine
artifact that Mother gave me.

323175.「この世界は 創失の呪いによって\n むしばまれつつある。:
This world is being consumed by the curse of
unmaking.

323176.「アストルティアを 守るためならば\n たとえ 憎き末弟を 利することになろうと:
Even if it means getting help from my
detestable younger brother, I must protect
Astoltia. You WILL help me.

323178.「兄上は 変わっていない。\n あなたの冗談は 昔から 下手だった。:
You haven't changed a bit.
Your sense of humor has always been
terrible.

323181.「断罪の剣……。\n よくぞ 我がもとに 戻った。:
The Sword of Atonement...
Once again within my grasp.

323184.「……ううっ 私は……。\n 儀式は どうなって…………？: Ugh... W...what's happened to the ritual...?

323186.「どうやら グランゼニス様は\n 断罪の剣を 入手できたようですね。:
I can see that Gran Zenith was able to obtain
the Sword of Atonement.

323187.「グランゼニス様の御身は 神々の間にあります。\n 光の神殿に 新たに設置した旅:
Gran Zenith's body lies in the Room of Revival. Could you please use the teleportal inside the Temple of Light to make your way
there?

323188.「よし。いよいよだな。\n 皆で 光の神殿へ向かうぞ！:
Good. It's finally time.
To the Temple of Light!

323190.「私は 降臨の儀式の結果を\n トビアスに 報告しなければなりませんので\n こ:
I have to report to Tobias what's happened
with the ritual, so I will take my leave here.
Please be careful on your way.

323191.「お待ちしていました。\n 皆さん ご無事なようで 何よりです。:
I've been awaiting your arrival.
I'm relieved to see that you are all safe.

323192.「ご覧ください。こちらが\n グランゼニス様の御身になります。:
As you can see here, this is Gran Zenith's
body.

323193.「この黒き姿は 我が罪そのものだ。\n 大義のためとはいえ 実の兄を\n この手:
This black figure is my sins made real.
Even if for a good cause, I killed my own
brother.... A terrible sin.

323194.「だが 兄と通じ合えた今ならば\n この断罪の剣で 我が罪を斬りはらえるはずだ。:
But now that I've connected with him, I should
be able to cut down my sins with the Sword
of Atonement.

323196.「勇気をもって 今ここに 我が罪を断つ！:
With my courage...
I now break free from my sins!

323197.「ありがとうございます グランゼニスさま。\n もう 大丈夫です。:
Thank you, Gran Zenith.
I'm okay now.

323198.「<pc> 心配しないで。\n グランゼニスさまに 身体を貸している間も\n 私:
No need to worry about me, <pc>.
I was conscious the entire time Gran Zenith
was using my body.

323199.「何があったのか 全部 知っているわ。\n あなたの活躍だって ちゃんと 見てた:
I know of everything that's happened.
I saw everything that you did!

323202.「お役に立てたなら 光栄です。: I'm honored that I could be of help.

323203.「おや グランゼニス様。\n 昔の話し方に 戻されるのですか？\n そのまま い:
Oh? Have you gone back to your old manner
of speech? I was beginning to think you'd
continue with your more stern demeanor.

323206.「ゼニアスには 新たな主神が必要。\n それが あなただ。\n ラキは やっと:
Zeniath needs a new Almighty, and that's you!
Lycae has finally found you!

323207.「あとは 王笏と王冠が そろえばいい！: All that's left is the Scepter and Crown!

323208.「王笏のほうは ネーしゃまが 持ってるよね。\n 王冠も 探しだすって言ってたけ:
Zenny has the Scepter, right?
She said she'd try and find the Crown,
but maybe she hasn't yet...?

323209.「ねえねえ まごゼニスさま。\n ネーしゃま……じゃなくて\n ゼネシアさまに:
Hey, Other-Zenith! Let's go and see Zenny...
Ah, no... Zenethia!

323217.「……はやっ！\n 思ってたんだけど まごゼニスさまって\n すごい せっかちさ:
He left so fast...! I was just thinking too...
Other-Zenith seemed pretty impatient...

323218.「それは 仕方ありません。\n あの方は ずっと 見ていることしか\n できなか:
So he is... After all, all he could do up
until now was watch.

323219.「そうですよね……。\n さっきまでの私も 手を伸ばしても届かない……\n そん:
Yes, that's true... Until just now, I felt
that same frustration. Reaching out, but
never quite able to touch.

323220.「後を追うことも 難しいでしょう。\n やるべきことを果たして 帰ってくるまでは:
It'll be quite difficult to follow after him,
so for now I think we should just wait
until he comes back from his business.

323221.「忘れぬうちに グランゼニス様から\n 託されていた報酬を あなたに 渡しましょ:
Before I forget, allow me to give you the
reward that Gran Zenith entrusted to me.
Please take it.

323222.「ああ そうです。\n 役目は終わったと 思いますので\n 白き導き手は 私に:
Oh, that's right. I think my work is finished,
so may I have back the Handy Horse?

323223.<pc>は シオンに\n白き導き手を 返した。:
<pc> returns the Handy Horse to
Shion.

323224.「それでは グランゼドーラ城に\n 戻らせていただきますよ。\n 賢者ルシェンダ:
I will return to Gran Zedora Castle and report
what's happened to Lushenda.

323225.「<pc>。\n 私も シオンさまと 城へ帰るわね。\n ポルテとラキも 本当に:
I'm going back to the castle with him.
<pc>, Porte, Lycae... Thank you so
much for all you've done!

323228.「ラキ どうしたの？\n おなかも空いちゃったし あたしたちも\n エテーネの村:
What's the matter? I'm starting to get hungry,
so let's head back to Ethene!

323252.「ふん。いかにも 我は ナドラガなり。\n 我には あの戦いは 昨日のことのよう:
Hmph. Indeed, it is I, Nadraga. I remember our
battle like it happened just yesterday, Gran
Zenith.

323253.「我も 本来の身体ではないが\n 貴様も似たような有り様に なっているな。\n:
I am not within my original body, but I can
see that you are not, either. Quite an
interesting predicament, wouldn't you say?

323254.「念入りに 封印までしておきながら\n 我が意思を呼び覚ました目的は……\n 断:
Even after going to such great lengths to seal me away, you have awakened my will...for the piece of the Sword of Atonement, I
presume?

323255.「ほう……。\n この我が 素直に返すと 思うてか？:
Oh? And you think I'll just give it back to
you?

323256.「……冗談だ。\n ずいぶんと 神らしいクチを\n 利くようになったではないか。:
...I jest. You've certainly learned to speak
like a true god, haven't you?

323257.「ははははっ！\n そうか。我は 冗談が下手くそか。\n 無駄かもしれんが 覚え:
Ahahaha! Is that right? My humor must really
be bad, then. I'll be sure to remember that,
despite it being pointless.

323258.「ふむ……。儀式の効力が 薄れてきたか。\n ならば 急がねばなるまい。:
Hmph. The ritual's effect is fading.
We should hurry.

323259.「今や 全きチカラを振るえる神は\n 貴様しか 残っておらん。\n 見届けるのだ:
The only god capable of wielding complete
power now is you. You are the fate of this
world...

323269.「おつかれさまでしたー！\n まごゼニスさまが 戻ってきたら\n あたしたちにも:
You too! Please let us know when Other-Zenith
comes back. Okay, Annie?

323270.「やっと 新たな主神を 見つけたのに\n どうして うまくいかない……。:
We've finally found a new Almighty,
so why aren't things going well...?

323271.「今回も おつかれさま <pc>隊長っ！\n あたしたちは 先に エテーネの村に:
Thanks again, Captain! We'll head
back to Ethene Village now. Drop by our
place later, okay?

325122.「緋石の間につながる道は 崩されましたが\n 手前の結界の間に 新たに 旅の扉を:
The path leading to the Crimsonite is severed,
but a new teleportal in the Barrier Chamber
will lead you there. Please make use of it.

325123.「では 私は これにて。: With that, I shall take my leave.

325124.「また 言うだけ言って 行っちゃった……。\n こっちの話も 聞いてほしいなぁ。:
He said what he wanted to say and just left
again... I wish you'd let us talk, too.

325125.「ラキは はやく\n グランゼニス神を 復活させたい。\n 古き神の遺跡へ行こう:
Lycae wants to revive Gran Zenith as soon
as possible. Let's go to those Historic
Ruins!

325258.飛竜に乗って エテーネの島の上空へ飛び\nそこから 光の神殿に 降り立とう。:
Fly above Ethene Island using your flying
dragon and descend to the Temple of Light.

325780.「ほこらに 急がねばならないが\n 通路が閉ざされてしまっているな。\n 別の道:
We have to hurry to the shrine, but the way
ahead is blocked. We'll have to find another
way.

326029.影の谷の通路と同時に いざないの間にある\nナドラガ神のほこら・闇 への旅の扉も:
The teleportal to the Dark Nadraga Shrine from
the Hall of Invitation has also been blocked
off. Try finding another way there!

326597.「母上。お呼びにより\n グランゼニス 参上いたしました。:
Mother. I, Gran Zenith, have come in response
to your call.

326598.「母上から 私に？\n それは ありがたいことですが\n いったい 何を？:
From Mother...to me? That is indeed kind of
you, but...what could it be?

326599.「おお。兄上や 姉上たちも持つ神器を\n ついに 私にも 授けていただけるとは\:
Ohh! To bestow upon me a divine artifact like
the ones my siblings have...it's a great
honor!

326601.「罪を断つ……か。\n では この剣を断罪の剣と 名付けよう！:
Cut down sin...
Then I shall dub this sword the Sword of
Atonement!

326657.「私では 兄を……。\n ナドラガを止めることは できないのか……。:
My brother, Nadraga...
I cannot stop him...

326658.「そうだ……。\n 母上より授かった この剣にかけて\n 私は ナドラガの罪を断:
You're right... With this sword that Mother
gave to me, I will cut down the sins that
Nadraga has committed.

326659.「我が兄よ。そして姉よ。\n 私に 最後のチカラを与えたまえっ！:
My siblings! Give to me the last of your
strength!

326661.「今こそ あなたの罪を断つ！\n 兄姉たちよ 私にチカラをっっっ！！:
I will cut down your sins here and now!
My siblings! Lend me your strength!!

326663.「どうして わかってくれないのだ……。\n 兄……上…………。:
My brother...
Why can't you understand...?

326664.「改めて 名乗っておくべきだね。\n 私は 女神ルティアナの末子にして\n 人間:
I should properly introduce myself. I am Gran
Zenith, youngest child of the Goddess Lutiana,
and god of the humans.

326665.「今代の勇者たちよ。\n あなたたちの これまでのはたらきには\n おおいに 感:
To the Heroes of this age...
I am truly grateful for everything that you
have done up until now.

326666.「いや 復活したと思ったら 勇者姫の\n 可憐な姿だったからね。せめて 神らしく:
No, well... When I revived, I realized I was
in the lovely form of the Hero Princess, so
I...tried to act more godlike.

326667.「もはや その必要もないよ。\n さて これからのことだけど……:
That's no longer necessary.
Now, about what's to come...

326669.「……私が ゼニアスの主神となることを\n 期待されているのは 重々 承知してい:
I am well aware that I'm expected to be the
Almighty of Zeniath. However...I am a god
of Astoltia.

326670.「執行者などと うそぶく連中が\n 創失の呪いを この地に振りまこうとするなら\:
If those who arrogantly call themselves
"enforcer" mean to spread the curse of
unmaking, then we have to stop them.

326671.「ゼニアスの主神となる話は\n 全てが 解決してからにしてくれ。:
We'll have to make sure all of that is
resolved before discussing about Zeniath's
Almighty.

326672.「……おお そうだ。\n ゴダの後継者にも 会っておく必要があるね。:
Oh, that's right! I have to meet with Goda's
successor!

326673.「時間が 惜しい。\n すぐに 行動に移すとしよう。\n では さらばだ！:
Time's of the essence, so I have to go now.
Be seeing you!

328858.「……きれーい。\n この緋石から チカラをもらえば\n いいんだよね？:
It's so pretty...
We're supposed to gather energy from
it, right?

328860.偽りのリャナ荒涼地帯から ソーラリア峡谷に入り\n古き神の遺跡の奥にある 緋石の:
Enter Solaria Canyon from the false Lyana
Desolate Area and head to the deepest part
of the Historic Ruins to meet with Shion.

328861.「その剣でしたら 隔離された竜族の世界……。\n 神墟ナドラグラムの大地に 残さ:
The sword yet remains in the isolated world of
the Nadravians...within the Nadragram Shrine.

328862.炎の領界 聖都エジャルナから行ける\nいざないの間の旅の扉で 神墟ナドラグラムに:
Head to Nadragram Shine via teleportal in the Hall of Invitation, which is accessible from Ejarna in the Fire Realm. Once there, go
and examine the Sword of Atonement.

328863.「神の器である おまえならば\n ナドラガの意思を その身に宿らせることが\n:
As a divine vessel, surely you can carry
Nadraga's will inside your body?

328864.「その子……。具合が 悪そうですね。\n よろしければ 私の部屋を使ってください:
That girl doesn't look so well...
You may use my room if you'd like.
